author: kboom_ro
content: We've been discussing in lean rainbow staking TG group about the possibility to use the "extra churn" - or the "remaining WS budget" after activation/ exit churn - for delegation / undelegation / redelegation, since delegations will (most likely) be embedded in lean consensus and in terms of introduced risk, 1 delegation = 1 activation, 1 undelegation = 1 exit and 1 redelegation = 1 exit followed by one activation
